description: 1. The Central Goods and Services Tax Bill 2017 (The CGST Bill) 2. The Integrated Goods and Services Tax Bill 2017 (The IGST Bill) 3. The Union Territory Goods and Services Tax Bill 2017 (The UTGST Bill) 4. The Goods and Services Tax (Compensation to the States) Bill 2017 (The Compensation Bill)
caption: pmindia.gov.in
message: Crucial bills relating to GST have been approved by the Cabinet, giving a boost to our reform agenda. http://www.pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/cabinet-approves-four-gst-bills/?comment=disable
